mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.email,b.status FROM REFUND r JOIN BUYLIST b ON r.buyno = b.buyno JOIN MEMBER m ON b.memberno = m.no ORDER BY FIELD(b.status,2,3), r.date ASC LIMIT #{startIdx}, 10
SELECT r.*, m.email, s.title FROM REFUND r JOIN BUYLIST b ON r.buyno = b.buyno JOIN MEMBER m ON b.memberno = m.no JOIN SELLLIST s ON b.sellno = s.sellno WHERE r.buyno = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE BUYLIST SET status = '3' WHERE buyno = #{buyno}
